tourBios.curYrHigh: Shot 70-70-66-68 to join PGA TOUR Latinoamérica as the Mazatlan, Mexico Q-School runner-up.
tourBios.carHigh:
2015: Had two top-25s and six cuts made in 11 starts on his first season as a professional on PGA TOUR Latinoamérica, where he finished 85th on the Order of Merit… Both of his top-25s were T16 finishes at the Guatemala Stella Artois Open in May and at the Aberto do Brasil in September… Named Mexico's Tecate Tour Rookie of the Year after finishing the season ranked 16th on the Order of Merit.

2014: Turned pro in October… Missed the cut at the Abierto Mexicano on his only start on PGA TOUR Latinoamérica… Missed the cut at the OHL Classic at Mayakoba in November (2014-15 season) on his first career start on the PGA TOUR.
tourBios.otherCarHigh: Played college golf at Baylor University, where he was named Academic All-American in 2014... Won the 2014 World University Games in Switzerland.
tourBios.personal: Earliest golf memory is playing his first golf tournament at the age of 6 in September of 1997… Has three younger siblings, Sofia, Mariana and Daniel… Graduated from HS at the San Diego School in Puebla, Mexico in 2009… Roger Federer is his favorite athlete outside of golf… His favorite course where he has played is the Ocean Course at Kiawah Island… His favorite restaurant is Zuma in Miami… Loves Asian food… “Suits” and “Blacklist” are his top TV shows… Twitter and Instagram name is @jerryruiz_bu… Snapshat name is @jerryruizbu
